title: When do we receive our Ten year Riot birthdays gifts?????

replies.body: All i got at the moment is the summoner icon :(

> [{quoted}](name=proMINscuous,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=WE2EFJPm,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-09-15T04:04:47.134+0000)
>
> All i got at the moment is the summoner icon :(

The icon and the Mystery Gift/Riot Kayle may arrive at different times, as the icon has a lot fewer conditions around it. No need to worry! :D

Both gifts (the icon, and Riot Kayle or Mystery Gift) should be distributed by the end of the day on September 24rd. If you don't have both of them by that time, you can contact Riot Games Player Support to look into it (but it honestly shouldn't be a problem). 

For the full announcement and details around the event, check out the official Riot article here:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you

Thanks for your support ;)

The roll out started this morning, I imagine everything will be distributed within the week (it looks like icons/ the other things are being given out at different times). 
Be patient.
I got a summoner icon this morning
Santa won't come if you don't go to bed.
